text: i majored in physics (grad student now) and just wanted to let you know that i also cried over a lot of physics homework... it's normal. you got this.

Just wanted to throw it out there that there are programs in UC that supplement TA pay. Not really sure it violated the contract to ask for a supplement... [https://medschool.ucsd.edu/education/neurograd/prospective-students/Pages/funding.aspx](https://medschool.ucsd.edu/education/neurograd/prospective-students/Pages/funding.aspx)
